title: HTTP Status Codes
description: Choose the correct status code for each scenario.
question: A user tries to update a task that belongs to another user. What HTTP status code should the API return?

options.text: 400 Bad Request - the request data was invalid
401 Unauthorized - the user is not logged in
403 Forbidden - the user is logged in but not allowed to access this resource
404 Not Found - the task was not found (for this user)
